replies.msg:
香港音樂人一直關注社運，Sony莊正、本地樂隊鬥牛梗主音朱華被告暴動罪。另一邊廂，重金屬樂隊Qollision主音徐東海 leejamestsui 亦都唔輸蝕，去年發表撐警偉論，支持開實彈射學生，仲話要開多幾槍添！

事件曝光後引起網民熱烈討論，有網友話：「而我不知道徐東海是誰」、「玩得metal,hip hop, rock n roll個D但又唔知道個音樂精神係（喺）邊到，你當你自己玩緊福音搖滾唱聖詩呀」、「玩heavy metal撐建制，真係香港獨有...」。徐事後已經火速刪除撐警貼文，原於十月嘅中大band show亦遭到取消。

徐擔任結他case品牌Quantum Industries設計師兼合夥人，喺Facebook同Instagram周不時見到佢哋嘅廣告。另有網民發現，多次喺Facebook share警暴片段嘅著名結他手Jason Kui亦係其中一名用家，實在令人嘖嘖稱奇。
而佢哋近期推出咗新產品可以裝drum set，唔知嚟緊又會有邊個鼓手幫佢哋賣廣告？








By會員#67032 水野朝陽


網民熱烈討論
https://www.facebook.com/355798304611089/posts/1118425875014991/?d=n


新產品

如果蘋果報紙定期送埋文宣貼紙 咁我地咪可以去到邊貼到邊？

Regarding Quantum Industries GTX01 Triple Guitar Case

I regret to let you know that the designer of the captioned guitar case, Mr Lee James Tsui 徐東海, is a fervent supporter of the Chinese authoritarian regime and its puppet government in Hong Kong, which suppressed democracy and used violence against its own citizen.

During the 2019-20 Hong Kong democratic movement, Mr Tsui openly supported the local police force, which terrorised largely peaceful protesters and citizen alike by deploying excessive force against anti-government protests. Facing protesters equipped with only hard hats, gas masks and umbrellas, the brutal police force unleashed lethal force, including live ammunition, rubber rounds, and unlawful use of police baton, as well as tear gas, sponge round and pepper spray. The crackdown on Hongkongers’ lawful aspiration for freedom and democracy has by now led to a few fatalities, numerous suicide cases, and a society full of trauma.

It is therefore outrageous to see Quantum Industries selling products at NAMM 2020. I wish to let you know that those products are designed by people who stands by state terrorism and autocracy, which is everything against the rock and roll spirit. People in Hong Kong are boycotting his products and we hope that you will do the same in solidarity with the freedom-loving Hongkongers.

May god bless you and America in the coronavirus pandemic.
